CustomField.defaultValue: "Call successful:0,Appointment set:3,Able to pitch:4,Decision maker not reached:5"
CustomField.description: Wrapup codes to be used in the call logs. Comma or newline separated list of text codes, with a numric identifier appended after a colon, eg: "Call Successful:0,Call Failed:1"
CustomField.label: Wrapup codes (inbound calls)
